body_html:
arange now returns a int64 tensor, while before it was a float32 tensor.
We should at some point support automatic casting, but for the moment you can specify the dtype argument to arange so that it returns a float32 tensor
body_text:
arange now returns a int64 tensor, while before it was a float32 tensor.
We should at some point support automatic casting, but for the moment you can specify the dtype argument to arange so that it returns a float32 tensor
body:
arange now returns a int64 tensor, while before it was a float32 tensor.
We should at some point support automatic casting, but for the moment you can specify the dtype argument to arange so that it returns a float32 tensor
